title: Ionic-Balance GENUINE CORE Series Band
features: Scientifically Proven Proprietary Formula ONLY used in genuine Ionic Balance Bands
Simple No-Nonsense Design - NEW Convex Shape for Comfort
24hr Wearability - 100% Waterproof Hypoallergenic Medical Grade Silicone
description: From the manufacturer Ionic Balance Core Series Ionic Balance Core Series Maximum Power, Minimum Price. Hypoallergenic Medical Grade Silicone CE Marked - Complies with all European Health, Safety & Environmental Protection Legislation Suitable for pregnant women and pacemaker users Ionic Balance Core Series Essentials for all wrists! The Ionic CORE Band is an elemental version of the Orginal Ionic Balance Band. With a fantastic 2000 Negative Ions per cm3 output crammed into this clean, cost effective design. Proprietary Formula ONLY used in genuine Ionic Balance bands 30 Day Money Back Guarantee 24hr Wearability - 100% Waterproof 2000 Negative Ions per cm3 output Simple No-Nonsense Design NEW Convex Shape for Comfort Ionic Balance Core Series The premise of the Ionic Balance Band is to emit Negative Ions (anions), Far Infrared Rays and Alpha Waves. These properties are then absorbed by the wearer. Ionic Balance wristbands emit the one of the highest levels of Negative Ions per cm³ per second of any wearable product on the market today. All Ionic Balance products are CE marked (European Commission) and comply with all European health, safety and environmental protection legislation. There are no known contra-indications for the Ionic Balance Band. Ionic Balance has engineered a unique Proprietary Tourmaline hybrid formula which is integrated into our wristbands, combining both fashion and function. The main ingredient in our active formula is Tourmaline which is blended with 10 other minerals and components. The Ionic Balance Band is constructed from hypoallergenic medical grade silicone. The active ingredient will maintain it's properties for several lifetimes. Look after your band and it will look after you. Our patent formula is unique to Ionic Balance. Accept no imitations! Make sure you have the correct size as per our sizing guide. Wear your Ionic Balance Band on whichever wrist you feel comfortable with, it does not matter which way round you wear it, the active ingredient is throughout the whole band, not in any one point. The band is waterproof so it can be worn during bathing, swimming and sporting activities. You can wear your band next to a watch or any other wristband or bracelet. For best results wear your band 24hrs a day. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us. All Ionic Balance wristbands, including our Power Series, CORE Bands, Tri-Twist Braids, Necklaces, Pet Tags and Fusion Magnetic all use our proprietary active formula.
